meta.name: Emily Johnson
meta.title: Software Engineer
meta.bio: Dedicated software engineer with a strong background in building robust and scalable applications. Skilled in Java, Python, and JavaScript technologies. Experienced with Meta, Amazon, and Google.

highlights: Developed backend systems for social media platform
Optimized database performance resulting in 20% faster response times
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features on schedule
Implemented RESTful APIs for external integrations
Led a team of 5 engineers in project delivery
Improved system reliability by 30% through automated testing
Contributed to code review process and maintained code quality standards
Developing machine learning algorithms for search optimization
Mentoring junior engineers in coding best practices
Led performance optimization initiatives resulting in 40% faster response times
Collaborated with product teams to define technical requirements and priorities
